cast.overview: It's the 1940s, and the notorious Axe Gang terrorizes Shanghai. Small-time criminals Sing and Bone hope to join, but they only manage to make lots of very dangerous enemies. Fortunately for them, kung fu masters and hidden strength can be found in unlikely places. Now they just have to take on the entire Axe Gang.
cast.title: Kung Fu Hustle

details.biography: Chiu Chi Ling is a true master of the Hung Gar Fist and has opened many schools around the world teaching that style. His father, Chiu Kau, was the extremely talented pupil of Lam Sai Wing, who in turn was the famous student of the legendary Wong Fei Hung.
details.name: Chiu Chi-Ling
details.place_of_birth: Hong Kong, British Crown Colony [now China]
